name: Lilith

trigger.text: Activate this card's On Play effect.

text: On Play: Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a Trigger other than [Lilith] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a Trigger other than [Lilith] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
